dct_title_s: Representatio totius orbis terraquei cuivs partes quae umbra carent fide catholica imbutae sunt, reliquae omnes inumbrate religionis catholicae expertes sunt
dct_description_sm: California shown as a labeled island with no place names and an indented northern coast.
Imprint taken from the cover of the atlas from which the document orignates.
Decorated title cartouche. Map flanked by allegorical scenes.
Issued in Sherer, Henrico: "Geographia Hierarchica sive status Ecclesiastici Romano-Catholici per orbem universum distributi. Monachii : Typis Mariae Magdalenae Rauchin Viduae, 1703. P. 34-35.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
